mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_NO , MEMBER_ID , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_CONTENT , INQUIRY_TYPE , INQUIRY_REG_DATE , INQUIRY_ANSWERED_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_INQUIRY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ memberId } , #{ inquiryTitle } , #{ inquiryContent } , #{ inquiryType } , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO TBL_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , REF_PROD_NO , REF_REVW_NO , REF_INQ_NO , ORIG_FILE_NAME , SAVE_FILE_NAME , SAVE_PATH , THUMBNAIL_PATH , FILE_TYPE , ATTACH_STATUS_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACH_NO.NEXTVAL , NULL , NULL , #{ refInqNo } , #{ origFileName } , #{ saveFileName } , #{ savePath } , #{ thumbnailPath } , #{ fileType } , DEFAULT )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.INQUIRY_NO) FROM TBL_INQUIRY A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT B ON(A.INQUIRY_NO = B.REF_INQ_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON(A.INQUIRY_NO = C.REF_POST_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT A.INQUIRY_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.INQUIRY_TITLE , A.INQUIRY_CONTENT , A.INQUIRY_TYPE , A.INQUIRY_REG_DATE , A.INQUIRY_ANSWERED_YN , B.ATTACHMENT_NO , B.ORIG_FILE_NAME , B.SAVE_FILE_NAME , B.SAVE_PATH , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH , C.DOWNLOAD_HITS FROM TBL_INQUIRY A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT B ON(A.INQUIRY_NO = B.REF_INQ_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_DOWNLOAD C ON(B.ATTACHMENT_NO = C.ATTACHMENT_NO) WHERE A.INQUIRY_NO = #{ inquiryNo } AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_INQUIRY SET INQUIRY_ANSWERED_YN = 'Y' WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{ inquiryNo }
